text: Gei nia daangada ga helekai gi Saul, “E hai behee? Jonathan dela ne hagahumalia Israel dangi nei, gei mee dela bolo ga daaligi hua gii made? Deemee loo di hai beenei, gimaadou la gu hagamodu i madau lodo ang gi Dimaadua dela e mouli, bolo deai dahi ngaahulu e doo i di libogo o maa ai. Di mee a mee dela ne hai dangi nei ne hagamaamaa mai baahi o God.” Malaa, nia daangada guu daa Jonathan gi daha mo di made.
